properties_notes.title: Property Notes
properties_notes.description: An extra information that is related to the property which in mentioned in general

data_sheet_section.title: Data Sheet Section
data_sheet_section.description: Specifies the source or origin of the property extracted from the datasheet's specific section. For example 'PERFORMANCE_OF_ONE_UNIT', 'PROCESS_DATA', etc

context_name.description: Every property that captured in data sheet would be fall in certain context. It may be NOZZLE, EQUIPMENT, SUB_PART.

anyOf.description: If the property is associated with the equipment, then the particular property context should be equipment
If the property is associated with the nozzle, then the particular property context should be nozzle
If the property is associated with the sub_part, then the particular property context should be sub_part.
